Thanks for your comments. More seeders are coming soon so just hang on.
So this is the game Halo2? and why is it in the MOVIEDVDR section?
No, this is not the game Halo 2. It is a DVD movie which contains secret stuff and such from Halo 2. Read the description for more info.

Hi. It's me Smurfa. Unfortunately someone stole my nickname.

I have something very important to tell you all. There are som errors in the information section.

1. Of course, I know that Joseph Staten makes the voice of the Grunts. I am sorry that I wrote Jason Jones. I always mix up these two people. I am sorry Mr. Staten. 
When I thought about I realised that it is probably Joseph that says "...the ultimate anti-son-of-a-bitch-stick..." to. Once again I appology for the error.

2. The ammunition in the M7 Submachine Gun is not 9mm. It is 5x23mm. I appology for this to.
WOW! This DVD is f*ucking awesome! Every fan of Halo must download it! Lots of good information and really proffesionally made, and the menus etc. are better than those of the movies you buy!

Thanks Wonkel, glad you liked it.

The forum is now up and running. Please post your comments or questions there.

http://forums.classic-gamers.com
can anyone tell me why the menu is almoste black when i start the film?.i only see a little bit of the menu some thing is wrong
Are you watching the DVD on a computer? If so you will need a DVD software to properly render the film. Try PowerDVD, WinDVD or any other DVD software and see if it helps.
Maybe if you explained what your problem is we might be able to help you.
this looks so awesome, could someone please seed i am at 64.4% and have been at this for a week i want this really bad, Halo 2 rules!
a week later 64.9%, someone plz seed
Can someone please seed?  There are like 5 of us that are stuck at 66.2%.  I've had this download going for a month and I want this download very much.  Thanks in advance!

Sorry for the long absence here, I had almost forgot about this movie. I also wish to apologize for all unanswered PMs, I didn't know these accounts had this feature. :P

Anyway, seeders are on the way and should be up within the next few days. Please check back soon.

If you have any further questions please contact me. Now that I know of the PM feature I'll check here more often. ;)

Now THIS is bullshit. I spend 4 days downloading and when I go to play then damn thing my DVD player say "check TV hardware" and then when I put it in my computer it works fine. Thing is I can't watch on my computer due to no speakers. Anyone know a fix?
It works fine for me. How did you burn the DVD? Because sometimes the disc will be unreadable by your DVD-player if you burn it "wrong".
